Shop
Single channel, active DI box that comes in 2 flavours. High end version (gold XLR pins on XLR connector) with Lundahl transformer and all film capacitors in the signal path. Budget version (nickel XLR pins on XLR connector) with OEP transformer and film capacitors on the input.
